"The Subtle Flavor is the Choice of Drag:
"Did you think you were finished because the decorations
are complete? Too bad! The content of our next
discussion has arrived! I tried making this myself but
the flavor wasn't so great and I can't seem to make
something that tastes good. Just having love should
be enough but to really get the spirit of creating
something I want to provide a subtle flavor...
So I have an item I want you to go get for me!
*Dropped by Baridran and Wyndila"

"デコレーション完成で終わったと思った？
残念！　次は中身の相談が来ましたー！
自分で作ってみたけど、味がイマイチで
どうにか美味しくできないか、だって。
愛情こもっていればじゅーぶんと思うけど
自作するという心意気に応えて、隠し味を
教えてあげたいんだよねー……
でね、取ってきて欲しいものがあるのっ！

※バリドラン、ウィンディラがドロップ"
